name: circleci-api-orb
description: A CircleCI orb that provides granular commands to interact with CircleCI's API.

scripts.orb:pack: find src -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -I % basename % | xargs -I % ./scripts/pre-pack.sh src % && circleci orb pack src/ > orb.yml
scripts.orb:cleanup: find src -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -I % basename % | xargs -I % ./scripts/rev-pack.sh src % && yes | rm orb.yml
